about me

Hi, I'm Janice. I'm a recent Yale graduate (Ã she!) currently taking a gap year in Taipei.

This blog will be an inconsistently- and haphazardly-curated collection of my photographs and half-formed thoughts. It will always be a work in progress. I'm not sure where this year will take me, but feel free to follow along!
